stimulusHtml: A simple pendulum is constructed by hanging a ball at the end of a string. The pendulum has a period of 1.0 s on Earth. Which of the following could allow the pendulum to have a period of 1.0 s on the Moon?
choicesHtml: Increasing the mass of the ball
Decreasing the mass of the ball
Increasing the length of the pendulum
Decreasing the length of the pendulum
Keeping both the mass of the ball and the length of the pendulum the same
